Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: NBC’s prerace broadcast seemed long, but in the end, the network’s Belmont Stakes coverage was worthy of a Triple Crown victory.
snippet: NBC’s prerace broadcast seemed long, but in the end, the network’s Belmont Stakes coverage was worthy of a Triple Crown victory.
